TopicTitle: Parachutes Autocut Midair Only Over water (RealChutes)

Articles.Content:
I posted this in the real chute thread but I didn't get any replies yet,

I have a weird problem with parachutes cutting midair automatically

Over land, the parachutes work perfectly. The chutes cut ONLY once I touch the ground. 

But over water, no matter what I do with the settings, the chutes cut mid air at around 30 to 50 metres, making my craft plummet and disintegrate into the water. 

Has anyone else experienced this? There are no null exceptions error messages or anything in the debug log. 

Here's my mod list:

UPDATE. I found that this part: 

 

was the thing that was causing me problems with the chute autocutting prematurely. All other parachutes from RealChute are working fine.

On 5/27/2016 at 10:10 AM, Insanitic said:

was the thing that was causing me problems with the chute autocutting prematurely. All other parachutes from RealChute are working fine.

Sorry for the revive, but did you remember what the part was? The screenshot is gone, and I'm having this exact problem. This is the only thread I can find on the whole internet about this issue, so it would be great to have a complete answer here for future generations.
